Hello everyone. My name is Jax and uh I'm a founding engineer at K-Scale Labs. We build open-source humanoid robots from hardware to software to um machine learning models and we build it especially for developers. Yeah. So, humanoids have been have been getting a lot of hype recently. You see the Tesla Optimus, you have Unit robots, you have uh 1X and etc. Um they're quite proprietary and they're quite expensive.
